name: 楊詠荍
objective: This course is a basic topics of Materials Science.  To learn the importance of the materials process, smart materials
schedule:
Introduction to the course and materials science
Atomic structure and interatomic bonding (I,II)
Elementary crystallography
The structure of crystalline solids (I,II,III)
Imperfections in solids
Perovskites and their applications
Biomaterials (I,II)
Environmental and society issues in Materials
materials: An Introduction, W.D. Callister, Jr. and D.G. Rethwisch, 10th edition, John Wiley and Sons, Inc. (2018).
